column4: has anyone used ubuntu remix with a netbook and had it with dual monitors? When i have windows in my 2nd monitor, and i then go back to the first monitor to bring the menu into focus.. everythign on the second monitor minimises, is there something i can do to stop this? it's irritating.

has anyone used ubuntu remix with a netbook and had it with dual monitors? When i have windows in my 2nd monitor, and i then go back to the first monitor to bring the menu into focus.. everythign on the second monitor minimises, is there something i can do to stop this? it's irritating.
